title: Manoa Falls
seo_title: Manoa Falls | Things to see in Waikiki, Hawaii
seo_description: Located in nearby lush Manoa Valley, is Manoa Falls trail - itâ€™s an adventurous way to explore the Hawaiian rainforest and enjoy views of the 150ft waterfall!
contents_1: Located nearby in the lush Manoa Valley, Manoa Falls trail is a popular hike for both families and avid hikers.
description: Located nearby in the lush Manoa Valley, Manoa Falls trail is a popular hike for both families and avid hikers. it’s also an adventurous way to explore the Hawaiian rainforest and enjoy views of the 150-foot waterfall in a tropical setting.
